text: puokke nung suor anak( mou ham meat) ampi chyophond . chaur anakpol tha chyophond teangnoh ku samreab a l laoh ning anakneasar . chaur puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh ning phsaahphsaa knea real banhhea del kaet mean rveang puok anak . chaur puok anak brate b tde tam a l laoh ning anaknoam sar robsa trong brasenbae puok anakchea anak mean chomnue men noh
